}

    overflow: hidden;
    margin: 0px;
    padding: 0px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
}

    text-transform: none;
    margin: 0px;
    padding: 0px;
}
.appikon-bis-inline-form-wrapper .appikon-bis-inline-form-description {
    margin: 0px;
    padding: 0px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    line-height: 1.4em;
}
.appikon-bis-inline-form-wrapper .appikon-bis-inline-form-submit {
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0px;
    margin-top: 10px;
    text-align: center;
}
.appikon-bis-inline-form-wrapper #appikon-bis-inline-form-message {
    margin: 0px;
    padding: 0px;
    margin-top: 10px;
    text-align: center;
}

    margin: 0px;
    padding: 6px 11px;
    border: 1px solid transparent;
    border-radius: 2px;
}
.appikon-bis-inline-form-success {
    background-color: #dff0d8;
    border-color: #dff0d8;
    color: #3c763d;
}
.appikon-bis-inline-form-error {
    border-color: #f2dede;
    background-color: #f2dede;
    color: #a94442;
}
.appikon-bis-inline-form-wrapper .appikon-bis-inline-form-footer {
    margin-top: 10px;
    font-size: small;
}
.appikon-bis-inline-form-wrapper .appikon-bis-inline-form-powered-by {

    margin-top: 10px;

.appikon-bis-inline-form-wrapper .appikon-bis-inline-form-powered-by hr {
    margin: 10px 0;

}

}

}

      <div class="text__left">
        <h2 class="heading" style="color: #333333;">JUST TWO INGREDIENTS:</h2>
        <p class="subheading" style="color: #333333;">cocoa and sugar</p>
      </div>
      <div class="text__right">
        <div class="rte" style="color: #333333;"><p>We make our chocolate with just cocoa beans and organic cane sugar: no added vanilla, lecithin, preservatives, flavorings, or cocoa butter.</p><p>By sourcing the highest-quality cocoa and carefully crafting small batches of chocolate, we strive to bring out the nuances within each individual bean.<br></p></div>

</div><div id="shopify-section-template--16459368956044__743a5db4-2467-4ba6-9d74-fe4b88728e47" class="shopify-section"><link href="//www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/t/97/assets/carousel-quotes.css?v=141078248616473066411704759238" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="all"><section class="carousel__quotes--wrapper   hide__arrows-mobile" style="background-color: #fffdf9">
  <div class="row section-spacing">

    <div class="flickity-viewport" style="height: 370px; touch-action: pan-y;"><div class="flickity-slider" style="left: 0px; transform: translateX(0%);"><div class="carousel__item--wrapper is-selected" style="position: absolute; left: 0px; transform: translateX(0%);">
          <div class="carousel__item">
            

            
              <div class="carousel__quotes" style="color: #333333">
                <p>Dandelion roasts and grinds beans from a single farm or cooperative at a time. It’s a winemaker’s approach, and each bar is as distinct from the next  as a Chianti is from a Barolo.</p>
              </div>
            

            
              <div class="carousel__author mt-40" style="color: #333333">
                
                  <img src="//www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/THE_NEW_YORK_TIMES.png?v=1746133709" alt="The New York Times" srcset="//www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/THE_NEW_YORK_TIMES.png?v=1746133709&width=352 352w, //www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/THE_NEW_YORK_TIMES.png?v=1746133709&width=832 832w, //www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/THE_NEW_YORK_TIMES.png?v=1746133709&width=936 936w" width="936" height="42" loading="lazy">
                
              </div>
            
          </div>
        </div><div class="carousel__item--wrapper" aria-hidden="true" style="position: absolute; left: 0px; transform: translateX(100%);">
          <div class="carousel__item">
            

            
              <div class="carousel__quotes" style="color: #333333">
                <p>Dandelion Chocolate has stood out in the new crop of bean-to-bar chocolate makers in America. ... Equally exciting is the way chocolate is used in their café ... blended into one of the best cups of hot chocolate I’ve ever had.</p>
              </div>
            

            
              <div class="carousel__author mt-40" style="color: #333333">
                
                  <img src="//www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/DAVID_LEBOVITZ_4670ce61-5b14-43d6-8f3d-ab1d38a427a8.png?v=1746133707" alt="David Lebovitz" srcset="//www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/DAVID_LEBOVITZ_4670ce61-5b14-43d6-8f3d-ab1d38a427a8.png?v=1746133707&width=352 352w, //www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/DAVID_LEBOVITZ_4670ce61-5b14-43d6-8f3d-ab1d38a427a8.png?v=1746133707&width=716 716w" width="716" height="42" loading="lazy">
                
              </div>
            
          </div>
        </div><div class="carousel__item--wrapper" aria-hidden="true" style="position: absolute; left: 0px; transform: translateX(200%);">
          <div class="carousel__item">
            

            
              <div class="carousel__quotes" style="color: #333333">
                <p>Each of Dandelion’s single-origin bars is unique to its terroir—the Dominican is nutty and bright, the Liberian earthy and umami-rich—and helps sustain the inhabitants (feathered and not) of the land.</p>
              </div>
            

            
              <div class="carousel__author mt-40" style="color: #333333">
                
                  <img src="//www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/VOGUE_263ee851-7954-4e2e-a43a-8fc70f6f9faf.png?v=1746133708" alt="Vogue" srcset="//www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/VOGUE_263ee851-7954-4e2e-a43a-8fc70f6f9faf.png?v=1746133708&width=330 330w" width="330" height="42" loading="lazy">
                
              </div>
            
          </div>
        </div><div class="carousel__item--wrapper" aria-hidden="true" style="position: absolute; left: 0px; transform: translateX(300%);">
          <div class="carousel__item">
            

            
              <div class="carousel__quotes" style="color: #333333">
                <p>Instead of using additives and strange, unpronounceable ingredients to alter the flavor of his chocolate, [Dandelion Chocolate] relies on the distinct taste of the beans.</p>
              </div>
            

            
              <div class="carousel__author mt-40" style="color: #333333">
                
                  <img src="//www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/SAVEUR_41727d14-f7e1-4b4c-992f-4a20f846d265.png?v=1746133708" alt="Saveur" srcset="//www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/SAVEUR_41727d14-f7e1-4b4c-992f-4a20f846d265.png?v=1746133708&width=352 352w, //www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/SAVEUR_41727d14-f7e1-4b4c-992f-4a20f846d265.png?v=1746133708&width=379 379w" width="379" height="42" loading="lazy">
                
              </div>
            
          </div>
        </div><div class="carousel__item--wrapper" aria-hidden="true" style="position: absolute; left: 0px; transform: translateX(400%);">
          <div class="carousel__item">
            

            
              <div class="carousel__quotes" style="color: #333333">
                <p>At Dandelion Chocolate’s bean-to-bar factory and café, you’ll find single-source chocolate bars roasted to subtle perfection.</p>
              </div>
            

            
              <div class="carousel__author mt-40" style="color: #333333">
                
                  <img src="//www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/CONDE_NAST_TRAVELER_MAGAZINE.png?v=1746133707" alt="Condé Nast" srcset="//www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/CONDE_NAST_TRAVELER_MAGAZINE.png?v=1746133707&width=352 352w, //www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/CONDE_NAST_TRAVELER_MAGAZINE.png?v=1746133707&width=832 832w, //www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/CONDE_NAST_TRAVELER_MAGAZINE.png?v=1746133707&width=1200 1200w, //www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/CONDE_NAST_TRAVELER_MAGAZINE.png?v=1746133707&width=1447 1447w" width="1447" height="52" loading="lazy">
                
              </div>
            
          </div>
        </div><div class="carousel__item--wrapper" aria-hidden="true" style="position: absolute; left: 0px; transform: translateX(500%);">
          <div class="carousel__item">
            

            
              <div class="carousel__quotes" style="color: #333333">
                <p>Small batch is what’s big at Dandelion Chocolate ... Here, the focus is on quality, not quantity: Made in small amounts (with no batch exactly the same), and it sells out almost immediately.</p>
              </div>
            

            
              <div class="carousel__author mt-40" style="color: #333333">
                
                  <img src="//www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/USA_TODAY_81fdc83f-5039-4176-8231-f6a2e9ba6601.png?v=1746133706" alt="USA Today" srcset="//www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/USA_TODAY_81fdc83f-5039-4176-8231-f6a2e9ba6601.png?v=1746133706&width=352 352w, //www.dandelionchocolate.com/cdn/shop/files/USA_TODAY_81fdc83f-5039-4176-8231-f6a2e9ba6601.png?v=1746133706&width=525 525w" width="525" height="42" loading="lazy">
                
              </div>
            
          </div>

<h3 class="heading h1 mb-20">ETHICAL SOURCING</h3>
<div class="rte body mb-44"><p>We source our cocoa beans directly, with boots (usually Greg's) on the ground at each farm. We are friends with our producers, and pay a premium over commodity price for our cocoa.</p></div>
